website_summaries.verdict: A Pleatco replacement cartridge for the Hayward Star-Clear Plus C-1200 cartridge filter.
pros: Features chlorine resistant end caps, which give the unit a longer lifespan
It measures  23.25 inches tall with an outer diameter of 8-15/16 inches and an inner hole diameter of 4 inches
Comparable to the Unicel C8412 and the Filbur FC1293
cons: This unit may not hold up as well as other, more expensive replacement cartridges

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Filter
customer_reviews.text: $20 cheaper for the same exact filter at my local pool store. This is a standard order for me. I use 2 a year. Great product. Please NOTE there is a TOP and Bottom to the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Plane Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Filter For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I have a Hayward Star-Clear 120 filter and these work good at filtering most of the gunk. My only issue is, they are hard to clean and I need to purchase a new one every year. For the money, I like these best - just wish there was a way to clean from the inside and push the dirt out. It gets trapped in the folds and makes cleaning very time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. ProvinceTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: As good as Hayward
customer_reviews.text: Purchased multiple filters over the years and the pleatco is the only one that performed as well as the Hayward models. The hold up well and clean very easily. I will continue to purchase these, unless the Hayward is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Match up cartridge size for easy install
customer_reviews.text: Cartridge filter is used to filter 30,000 gl. pool and last aprox. 7-12 days before cleaning. I rotate 3 filters throughout the summer especially when your Labrador takes the occasional plunge. I use my pressure washer on a low setting to expedite cleaning. These filters will take abuse and demanding conditions. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Batch

customer_reviews.title: good oem quality with out the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these filters for the next season. the pool store wanted over 100 buck each. I got 2 for that price. I like to keep an extra one around so I can take the system off line momentarily and get another filter in so there is no break in service. Pleatco filters are quality, don't be fooled by imitations.
customer_reviews.author: Richmann

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly and it appears to be a good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and it appears to be a good replacement...the main reason for the review right now is to let future customers know that my filter says "Made in Mexico" on the filter and the box it was mailed in. The write-up says "Made in the USA"...certainly not the one I received. If that is a deal-breaker...than future customers may want to re-evaluate their future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Power
customer_reviews.text: This filter really cleans the water for my 15' X 30' pool. I use the Barracuda cleaner 6 to 10 hours a day, depending on the season. I clean the filter every 2 to 4 weeks depending on the season. It easily comes clean with proper rinsing. It's atruly easy maintenance product.
customer_reviews.author: DR. IRA JAY COHEN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying/using these for years and never a complaint. They last so much longer than the Hayward that we used for the 1st 10 years in our pool. I was very hesitant to make the switch as they were so much less in cost, I thought for sure it would be a case of "you get what you pay for", but not true in this case. Very happy & just ordered a new one as we like to keep an extra one handy.
customer_reviews.author: ToTellTheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cleans better then any other filters I bought in the past. The best part is, it is Super easy to Clean. Great material used in this filter. Pool is Crystal Clear. Almost plastic like pleats that trap everything. I clean my filter once a month. Simple rinse with hose with garden spray nozzle. Great buy will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart
customer_reviews.text: this filter is coming apart after 2 weeks of use. About a quarter of the slats have come unglued to the rings. I found this after I had high pressure readings after 2 weeks of use. my pool was cloudy but nothing that should cause this.
customer_reviews.author: jpenia79

customer_reviews.title: Looks a like a goof filter, will know in a month
customer_reviews.text: Just got this filter as replacement for the original Hayward. Was a tight fit in the beginning but workable no the less. Seems durable. I will check it’s strength and durability in about 2 weeks . Filter is taken out and cleaned every month due to coconut tree flowers sucked into the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Benito A. leon

customer_reviews.title: Great filter and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement filter for my above ground pool! And at less than half the price of the same filter at the pool store. And they are quite durable can be cleaned several times before disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement,great price,identical to the old one
customer_reviews.text: Cartridge was purchased to replace 1 1/2 year old cartridge that was about to the end of it’s usefulness,it’s an exact replacement for the old one at a better price than the pool supply stores that sells the same identical cartridge,even the same name on the cartridge
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best and least expensive cartridges on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my DE filter with a cartridge filter 6 years ago. Although I prefer the cartridge filter to the DE, I have tried several different cartridge replacements but they all seemed to clog quickly so I was going through a couple of filters every year. I decided to give Pleatco a chance because at the price I could buy 2 cartridges for almost what I was paying for just one cartridge. Although I was not expecting much. To my surprise these have been by far the best cartridge that I have found. In fact, I have had at least 2 cartridges last me a year.
customer_reviews.author: The guy

customer_reviews.title: Good filter cartridge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Cartridge that was recommended to me by my pool guy. I am very happy with these and the price was right. They work as well or better than other filters I have used costing much more. I will continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This Pleatco filter cartridge is the best I've found for my pool pump system----best cleaning, durability, and longevity. I had been buying it at a local pool store for more than twice the price! Glad I found this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Boomer Sooner

customer_reviews.title: Great filter !!
customer_reviews.text: The new filter had my pool looking amazing in no time! Great delivery , quick and I will by again next May .
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Durante

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Only been a week and can already tell this is a great filter. Pressure has remained constant...right at 10psi with very little fluctuation, even after vacuuming. My previous filter needed to be cleaned almost weekly...doesn't look like that will be the case here, but time will tell. I will definitely update if my opinion/observations change. But for now, I am sold on Pleatco!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo B.

customer_reviews.title: Best value best price
customer_reviews.text: These were the Best Buy ever. Kept my old ones going as long as I could because they’re so expensive but these were an amazing price and worth every penny. Now my pool is crystal clear for days and days!
customer_reviews.author: G Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Filters
customer_reviews.text: These are 2/3 the costs of the filters I have been buying at my local pool store and every bit as good. They have so far cleaned up easily with a hose although I would suggest paying for a top quality hose sprayer to get as much dirt out as you can.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stamper

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a bunch of filters for my pool since I moved in and this was by far the best. It's made of a different material compared to others and it much more durable and lasts much longer. This is made of a playable, yet soft plastic material whereas others are made with paper. I much prefer this one when cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Allan R

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done for cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect fit, very good last fairly lone cleans pretty well last the pool season for me and my 12,000 gal pool. Reordered two more so all set for another year or so.
customer_reviews.author: G. Young

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with the visual quality of the plastic compared to my old ones. Quality and durability to be determined. The oily film on the blue plastic can be seen on the surface of the pool. Still a great value
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: So glad this product finally came down in price and it does last a little longer than manufactures time limit but you have to clean often to save I am buying new
customer_reviews.author: Donnarose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have been using replacement filters bought at a local home improvement mega store, (you know the one with the orange and white logo), for years because of the cost factor, but they never fix quite correctly. This replacement filter was right on, when I installed it, it dropped right in. In the internal cavity their is a rigid support half way down the filter that I have never seen before even on Hayward filters, it seems like a great idea. Since the filter is correctly sized, I did not have to struggle with installing the filter top afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Fla Nuker

customer_reviews.title: This one isn’t so great, maybe the next one
customer_reviews.text: Since 6 days into owning the cartridge I have not been able to get it clean enough to keep the pressure down. The company even said that I needed to purchase their soaking tablets to use on my 6 day old filter. So I did, and still no chance.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Best pool cartridge
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review until I'd had the Pleatco cartridge for a few months. I can now say that it's the best cartridge I've ever bought for my pool. It's still going strong and I feel it's quite a bit better than the OEM Hayward cartridges and definitely a lot better than other after-market brands.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Engelman

customer_reviews.title: Better quality & lower price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for our aging Hayward filter at half the cost! I've only used it for about a month, so I can't rate it's durability, but it appears to be better made than the Hayward we replaced so I expect it will last.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: My filter shipped on time and quickly. It arrived in great condition and ready to install. This is my second order from this company and I would order again. Filter, by design is a bit difficult to clean but I use a garden hose with a strong water pressure. For the money, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxflboy

customer_reviews.title: Great value works well
customer_reviews.text: My pool guy was going to charge me $100 for similar product. This lasted me a year on my 2cnd. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: I had the last one believe it or not three years. Cleaned it on a average of every three weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchaser
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat purchaser of this pool cartridge. The price is so much better than the pool stores here in town, and the quality is matched. Quick delivery and smooth packaging meant my pool was blue in no time
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my Hayward Star Clear + C1200 . It was not treated but I didn't see any difference and with the price being 50% less, it was well worth it. I will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this pool filter many times before and they always work great. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filter
customer_reviews.text: Have had this now for over a year. My pool filters a lot of debris. 15000 gallon. Pool guy today said I probably can get another 2-3 months from it. excellent filter.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: It is a great value for my money, saves me time in cleaning and it appears to be made of good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Padilla

customer_reviews.title: I do not want green pools and flam
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best filter for the price. Hayward is about $70 more and is the same quality. I have a very large, old, in ground pool, made of porous concrete; it is very hard to keep clean. Pool was greenish before putting this in. I dumped some chlorine and let this do the rest. Greta product
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Durability!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these before and I have had very good service. They stand up well in frequent washings. The pool stays cleaner because of having more circulating force.
customer_reviews.author: Don Coulon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cartridge!
customer_reviews.text: This cartridge works extremely well. I have used this brand for the past 5 or 6 years and I'm very happy with both the way they keep my pool clean and clear, the way they last and the cost.
customer_reviews.author: cattledog mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than OEM
customer_reviews.text: Higher flow rate than the genuine filter that came with my Hayward. Price is good enough that I get a new one every 6 months now. Highly recommend to anyone with a pool that has leaves, sand, or other heavy filter needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: Well made filter
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with how the filter is made....it's a whole lot better than my previous filter.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Cost and quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was ordered and received just as stated in the add,price was a factor in ordering and after I recieved it,it was equal to a much more expensive one I had bought before. In fact it beat proposed delivery time. Very satisfied so far and will reorder as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clymer

customer_reviews.title: So far it has performed as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easier to clean the previous one I got from a pool store. Doesn't seem to catch nearly as much as the previous model but considering the saving, I'm willing to live with having to clean it more often.
customer_reviews.author: John Few

customer_reviews.title: Great service, it came early
customer_reviews.text: Great service, it came early. It fit and seems to be working fine. Seller did a good job. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It only last for one season - its not good
customer_reviews.text: It comes apart and does not hold like the Hayward. I used my Hayward filter for almost 3 years after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Glennsh3

customer_reviews.title: Blue ring with cracks
customer_reviews.text: After received and open the package, I noticed the blue ring have a cracks, probably gone after using couple months, I’ll write again. Had a same brand for two years and never saw any cracks before. Probably is no a original pleatco brand.
customer_reviews.author: Silbalo

customer_reviews.title: Get the Alladin instead for same money
customer_reviews.text: Filtered fine at first but plugs up and cannot be cleaned properly.. I also bought an Alladin filter which is FAR better. Pleatco seems to not be paper and the pleats break loos from the outside band after a couple uses. The Alladin cleans well and is much better quality on the build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy an original filter
customer_reviews.text: Not like the original filter. It only has 3 supports and less dense than original. Did not use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This cartridge is at least 40% cheaper then the ones they have at the pool store. It works very well and is a great value. With weekly maintenance, this cartridge lasts me the whole year. . I have purchased two so far and will be buying a third this spring.
customer_reviews.author: R Reo

customer_reviews.title: Received Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered the Pleatco PA120 5 times now and after about 8 months they start to break down; however, the last one I purchased completely fell apart in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not true replacement for Original
customer_reviews.text: Size was slightly off. Caused minor leakage around o-ring seal on filter housing.
customer_reviews.author: enjoying

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as the one I get from my pool supply that costs twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: New clean pond filter
customer_reviews.text: Easy to replace. Nice to have a new filter in place.
customer_reviews.author: jcw

customer_reviews.title: I love this filter
customer_reviews.text: I love this filter! I have three large breed dogs that swim with me and this brand of filter has cut my cleaning time by half. After hurricane Irma we also lost our pool screen resulting in a lot of garden debris being blown into the water - again, this filter is up for the task - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Jones

customer_reviews.title: it began to render the pump useless within hours of being cleaned
customer_reviews.text: This is an inferior product. It had to be cleaned after only two days of use. After a couple of weeks, it began to render the pump useless within hours of being cleaned. The plastic bands are loose and the filter's folds are loose and ineffective. I've replaced it with a filter from a local pool store, which works perfectly even with the subpar water conditions due to the failure of the Pleatco filter. The only reason I gave this product even one star is that I couldn't otherwise get to this review page. I plan to let my son use this product to back up targets for his BB gun, though I doubt it will even work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Semple

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. This filter clogs within an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This filter clogs within an hour or so. It is junk. I've tried cleaning it, soaking it and it always clogs. Never had this problem until using this filter. I'm goingback to the pool store and buy one that works. This filter is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Manateebob

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: It fits great and looks pretty good I think it's gonna work out for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter LOW Cost
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, works great, this is a second time order and I have saved enough on the first two to cover the cost of the nest one. Replaced each filter after one year of service.
customer_reviews.author: PHV

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this filter for over 5 years now. They last and are easy to clean it keeps our pool looking great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: this was a great value, this is the second filter replacement I have bought
customer_reviews.author: hungry  for  knowldge

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great filter; got almost 2 years out of it. Supposed to last for about 12-18 months. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Same as sold considerably more expensively in Pool Stores
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this filters for over a year now and they work really well. They are the same as sold in pool stores but considerably cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo Rolo

customer_reviews.title: Filter works great
customer_reviews.text: Filter arrived early and works great. It is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even the low amount!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saved a bunch of money by buying this one, however, it only really lasted a month, so not worth it. Just like previous reviews, it clogs very fast. I can clean the filter, then start vacuuming and I only get about one third done before it loses most suction. Today was the final straw, got back from camping for 4 days, there was some algae on the bottom, so I cleaned the filter, started vacuuming, and the water coming out of the return jet was green. Great filter! Once it's dried out, it will use it to start my next campfire!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik R. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Well made unit
customer_reviews.text: Pleatco is an excellent quality filter cartridge. Fit and finish is as good as OEM.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Cocoa FL.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Filter at way below Big Box Stores
customer_reviews.text: Flow through this filter is much better than similar filters I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest filter I've seen for my above ground pool! I put it in and my pool was clean therr next day!
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: The price is one of the best we have seen
customer_reviews.text: This Cartridge is exactly what we needed in our Hayward. We have purchased replacements locally and online and this is the best price we have found. Plus it works great.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that you can easily clean this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement filter. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement filter. Works as expected. Cleans easy and looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: stevessf

customer_reviews.title: My goto filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought similar filter at a big box store and it was garbage. These filters have never given me any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: PeterH

customer_reviews.title: Decent price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works quite as well Denis OEM
customer_reviews.author: newstudent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal on a fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price for and already fantastic product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gilles Galoustian

customer_reviews.title: quality seems very good, pump pressure is staying low and our pool ...
customer_reviews.text: I was going to by a more expensive brand but tried this one, quality seems very good, pump pressure is staying low and our pool looks great! Our pool gets a lot of sand from the wind, so far so good! Very Happy I will buy another one for backup now too, great value for what appears to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: lasts 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: then it plugs up. this is my 2nd one and it really is about 1 yr on the mark. I've tried washing, soaking, even pressure hose. there's a fine sediment that builds up towards the center. I live in FL and run the pool year round. someone wrote the hayward ones lasts 4 yrs for $75. Iam going to try that next....
customer_reviews.author: chopstick1

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Product fit great just as described! Our pool was blue within a day. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Christian J

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly and cleans easily. Super service
customer_reviews.text: It came on the third day and was immediately put to use as the old filter had gotten plugged up. It works perfectly and cleans easily. Super service.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Better paper for better filtering.
customer_reviews.text: I could tell the difference right away from the old filter. It clearly is a very well made filter.
customer_reviews.author: Rex E. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I think it's better than the namebrand. And a whole lot cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Stoweaway

customer_reviews.title: It didnt last 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I need to replace this already our last filter lasted over a year . Wont be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Wetever

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Priced a bit cheaper than the brand name. The pleats could be a bit closer together but it's made well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cartridge!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent alternative to the more expensive Hayward filter cartridges. It does a great job filtering the pool water and lasts as long as the OEM cartridge. It seems to be made of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kalibr

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This fits better than the manufacturer's filter! It has never been as easy to replace the filter cover on our Hayward.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I buy cartridges every 2 years for my pool
customer_reviews.text: Pleatco is among the best and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Corbett

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my pool filter and I cleaned it for the first time yesterday and it still seems to be holding up. Was worth it to buy at a discounted price from amazon rather than the expensive pool company's stores. Don't think you can go wrong, quality is the same as was pool supply stores sell.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get clean
customer_reviews.text: Had to take it to the car wash high pressure hose to get it clean
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be very good. Time will tell about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Raffa

customer_reviews.title: This filter fits and works perfectly for our Hayward filtration ...
customer_reviews.text: This filter fits and works perfectly for our Hayward filtration system. It is a superb value and everyone was extremely helpful in answering our questions prior to purchasing. We will indeed be purchasing this item again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the same filter every year for the last three years, works great.
customer_reviews.author: FLGUY

customer_reviews.title: pool filter
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the durability, Fast delivery. Using in my cartridge pool filter. 8 months and no problem
customer_reviews.author: Florida Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my Hayward filter. Works great so far and the cost was far below others can't tell a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This filter works just as good as the filter you get at your local pool ...
customer_reviews.text: This filter works just as good as the filter you get at your local pool supply store for $50 more.
customer_reviews.author: Primefan

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit as replacement for old filter.
customer_reviews.text: Old filter (same as this one) lasted well, and I expect this one will too.
customer_reviews.author: JimQ

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: They aren't as good as the Hayward brand cartridges, but still an OK value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kuske

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Filter
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement, fit and worked just fine. Have used before, replace pond filter once a year with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time. It was the right item and it came in the right size package
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it better than my old one. New material cleans better.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Kuchenbecker

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Filter fits exactly as described. Well built and so much cheaper than the local pool store! packaging was more than adequate to keep the element from getting destroyed. I will never buy a filter at more than twice the cost at a big box store either!
customer_reviews.author: Art H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - The price was perfect, the timing of the filter's arrival was spot on. We have been using this filter now for several months and I would highly recommend it to anyone needing a replacement. We take it out and wash it as required and it has done a fabulous job as to be witnessed by the amount of debris that it collects and which we can easily wash out with our hose. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Cygnet

customer_reviews.title: My report 😊
customer_reviews.text: Our pool was working overtime until we bought this new filter. It fits perfect and works perfectly to replace the original filter
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

product_meta.title: Pleatco PA120 Replacement Cartridge for Hayward Star-Clear Plus C-1200, 1 Cartridge
product_meta.description: Size:1-PackPleatco FREE FLOW CORES deliver better water flow rates enhancing filtration. Further, this efficiency reduces wear and tear on the pump, uses less energy, and provides longer life to the cartridge. This is even more important as more home owners switch to more efficient multiple and variable speed pumps. Highly efficient, spun bonded polyester REEMAY Filtration Fabric is used in all Pleatco Filter Cartridges. The uniform flow distribution created by Pleatco's Free Flow Core results in even dirt loading providing cleaner water. Using an inferior core or lower quality bands significantly detracts from the cleaning capabilities of the filtration fabric- no matter the brand. Pleatco break-resistant bands keep pleats clearly defined and evenly separated for greater flow of water. In other cartridges, poor bands lead to collapsed pleats which reduces the usable area of the filter, decreases the filter's life, and increases back press- sure throughout your entire filtration system.
feature_bullets: Replacement filter for pool and spa cleaning systems
50% open ABS free flow cores maximize water flow through REEMAY filter media
Antimicrobial end caps resist chlorine degradation and provide support to filter material for a longer life span
Length 23 1/4", Outer Diameter 8 15/16", Top Hole & Bottom Hole 4"
Replaces Unicel C-8412 and Filbur FC-1293
